channel.title: Monsterhearts 2 – Once Again We Return: The Musical
channel.description:
Attending all sessions is fun but not mandatory. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
*Every 90 years, 12 gods return as young people. They are loved. They are hated. In 2 years, they are all dead.*
This is a Monsterhearts 2 campaign that uses Patrick Knowles' "Once Again We Return" supplement (from Codex: Glamour 2), which tells the story of young gods reincarnated as extremely popular young people (we will play in the 18-22 range), combined with my experimental Musical Module that turns games into musicals. No actual singing will be done, and you'll enjoy the most out of this game if you're able to imagine scenes while reading about what's going on.
We will do some theme picking on the first session, but come in expecting sexuality & infatuation, cruelty & bullying (the former much more than the latter), violence (when meaningful) & fear, confusion & mystery.
The X-card will be used, and we will be observing the [Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
